wikipedia_page.main: Gwyn Evans (born 6 September 1957 in Maesteg) is a former Wales international rugby union player. In 1983 he toured New Zealand with the British & Irish Lions. He played club rugby for Maesteg RFC.

response: * Gwyn Evans, Wales and British Lions, rugby union player.
*  Gwyn Evans Wales international and British Lion

Since then Tommis has collaborated with musicians such as Huw Warren, Gwyn Evans, and Lleuwen Steffan in the recording of many of his own songs. There are two CDs of Tommis' songs: The Cat Lover and Main Beam Blinded. Performances of Tommis' music have been heard in France, Australia, Canada, Argentina and Denmark.
